name: Dice Towers
description:
Dice Towers is an addictive board game, that brings joy and fun to all players.

Build towers from dice in simple and addictive gameplay that will challenge you. Drag the dice that appear at the bottom of the screen to others of the higher rank on the board. You may move correctly placed (from higher to least) parts of towers as well. Put dice from six to one to make a complete tower, that will evaporate to leave space for new dice and towers.
Build as more towers as you can!
Download now and spend fascinating time.

Dice Towers features:

SIMPLE GAMEPLAY
Play anytime and anywhere. Just relax and make a couple of towers.

PLAY ALONGSIDE YOUR FRIENDS
See the best score of your friends in the Game Center.

TRAIN YOUR BRAIN
Think of a winning strategy.

No in-app purchases, complicated game design or stressful time limitations! Get the quality app for a small fee.
